entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.6°C

Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 91 %

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
